runs.comm: starts off with a drifter on middle and leg, no turn at all. Dickwella comes down and clips to midwicket to get SL going
oh nicely bowled. Much slower outside off, a hint of turn but the ball hardly came on. Dilshan waited and waited and inside-edged to square leg for a run

absolute beauty. Just a stunning display of loop and flight, with just the right pace. Tossed up wide outside off, drawing Dickwella forward. Beaten and Dhoni whips the bails off at his own pace. Dickwella seemed intent on advancing to the offbreak bowler. Ashwin showing his class.
ooh, how is that? That is a good appeal. Slowed up outside off, Chandimal prods and is hit in front. Big appeal, not given. Maybe too much doubt.
carrom ball down leg, Chandimal looks to sweep but is hit on the pad. An appeal, but that was rather optimistic. Pitched outside leg

gone. Dilshan falls now. Sl in early shambles. Looked out at first glance. Tossed up again on off, lots of turn beats Dilshan on the inside edge and strikes him in front of off. Maybe a bit high but would have hit some part of the stumps. Ashwin is showing off, but it is spinning
another appeal, but that was optimistic too. Pitched down leg, inswing carries it further down leg to hit Chandimal on the pad. Easy call.
short and wide, lots of time for Chandimal to cut into the covers. Not quite coming on here.
an event-a-ball start here to the third T20. Full and wide, Chandi flays a drive over cover point. Did not bother keeping that down. Good intent, excellent execution
not quite short enough this time to cut, but he goes through with it. Chopped to point

good counterattacking batting this from Chandi, not sure there is a need so early on though. Full delivery, swinging in to Chandi on leg who shimmies down and lofts the drive over mid-on. Not all of it, but enough to the boundary on many bounces
full, swinging down leg again. Chandi is late on his flick and is hit on the pad. A scampered leg bye

Ashwin has his third. Chandi implodes. Another floated up delivery on off, Chandimal comes down, looking for an expansive heave, but gets nowhere near it. Chandi is not quite to the pitch because Ashwin has cleverly dragged the length back just enough. The ball skews up off the outside half and Pandya takes a sitter.
carrom ball on leg, not a bad delivery to a person who hasn't faced him too much. This is defended though
excellent bowling. Off the thigh pad, to leg slip. Raina drops it, but not sure there was any bat on it. Yup, no bat
driven to cover

not a bad shot at all. Not reading him, so he gets down low and executes a sweep, Played it all alojg the ground. Jadeja does brilliantly at the backward square leg boundary to prevent the boundary. Rocket throw too.
a bit flat outside off, pushed into the covers for a quick single
nice start from Bumrah. Length delivery outside off, not much movement. Left alone on that fourth-stump line.
a loose waft. 133 kph. Outside off, a hint of away movement. Gunaratne pokes and is beaten.
another fullish length delivery on off. No movement. Defended into the cover region.
133 kph. Skids off the pitch with a hint of inward movement to hit Asela in the midriff. Ouch.
much better from Gunaratne. Opens the face of the bat to guide down to third man. Keeps the strike rotating.

smashed. Picked the length early and executed well. Just a tad short, actually wasn't even short enough. But MS goes through with the pull, clears mid-on easily and on the bounce to the boundary. Nicely done there
87 kph, a tad flat outside off, Blocked back

given. Looked like an iffy decision at first sight. Flat down leg, a bit of turn, just enough. Off the thigh pad, to leg slip. Raina takes it. But was there some bat before that? Doubt it, unlucky for the batsman. Asela plays an indecisive flick after not reading the spin correctly
lots of flight and air and loop. Spin too and takes the inside edge of the batsman
ooh,l well defended. Carrom ball on middle, that one moved away but Shanaka defends confidently
floated up outside off, off the pad towards slip.

was that a chance. Another carrom ball, the line is wider outside off. Shanaka doesn't pick it until very late. Jams his bat down in time, was there a bit of an outside edge to Dhoni? Very hard anyway.
swing, but started well down leg. Easy call of wide

Siriwardana plays a loose stroke. And pays the price for it. Bnaged in on a good length on off, Siriwardana misjudges the length and goes for an expansive pull, just like he did in the previous over. It keeps  a bit low and clatters into off and middle stump. Poor stroke.
good length outside off, pushed with the full face of the bat to cover. Rahane does well.
back of a length on off, blocked back.

that will be four. Good length delivery on off, that was short enough to be pulled and Prasanna executes it nicely. Cleared square leg easily. Got to be careful with a touch of variable bounce on offer
back of a length outside off, just a tap to cover.
variable pace now. Fullish length outside off, just stops in the wicket but Prasanna is through his expanisve drive and gets a thick inside edge which evades Dhoni and flies to the fine leg boundary
starts off with some flight on middle, turn. Defended watchfully
phew. Beauty. Pitches on middle and leg, spins, rips in fact and takes the outside edge of the batsman. No chance for Dhoni with that much movement. Past slip and to the boundary
driven to short mid-on
floated up outside off, plenty of ripping turn to take the ball past the outside edge
flat on middle, steered to point
92 kph. Flat on off, blocked towards point. A 10-second over from Jadeja
Yuvi starts with a flat delivery outside off, pushed uppishly to deep point
86 kph, on off and driven back to Yuvi
massive full toss outside off. Too high and called a no ball. What a freebie that is. Shanaka deposits it way over the midwicket boundary. Easy runs.
the free hit is punished as well. Flat outside off, whacked back over his head for a six. Yuvi is bleeding runs. Great shot from Shanaka
slowed up outside off, driven to deep cover

what has happened there? Has Jadeja done it again? This could be catastrophic. It is. What a piece of fielding that is. India on fire at the moment. Driven back to Yuvi who fumbles it, the pair go for a run but Jadeja who is lurking at cover, runs in, picks up, and flicks an under-arm throw direct at the non-strikers end.
flat outside off, left alone
massive appeal, but that was the right decision. Flat outside off, spinning back in prodigiously. Would have hit the stumps but struck the batsman outside the line of off. Good call
flat again, starts it on middle and the ball spins down leg.
darted in outside off, a steer to point earns Thisara one. All runs being earned
wow. This is amazing to watch. Massive turn from middle to bet the outside edge
flat outside off, beaten again with the turn. Dhoni takes the bails off, just when he feels the batsman has over-balanced. But the leg umpire doesn't want to go up.
flat outside off, beaten by a mile. Two miles.
flat on off, the batsman comes down the track and defends. Makes contact with this turning ball.
125 kph, full delivery on off to start from Pandya. Pushed to long-on. Nice batting. Stay in this game for as long as possible.
length on middle and off, tucked towards square leg for a run.
a fullish length outside off, chopped away to deep point
worked away off his pads towards midwicket for a run. Four off the over so far.
full on off and middle, patted back
lovely fielding by Yuvi at midwicket. Punched off the back foot towards long-on but Yuvraj intervenes with a dive.
flat on off, blocked
slower through the air outside off, pushed towards point

bowled im. Played on. SL are 7 down now. Flat outside off, turn again. Shanaka looks to open the face and work it down to third man but the ball doesn't spin as much as Shanaka anticipated, which helped in taking the inside edge. Clattered into off stump.
slower outside off, beats the bat by a distance
tossed up on off, guided to point. Perera wants one but is sent back.
tossed up outside off, left alone. A wicket maiden, the second of the innings.
short and wide, crunched away to deep cover
opens the face of the bat to guide to third man
short and wide again, too much width. Perera creams a cut past cover and into the deep cover fence. No chance for any fielder.
too much width again outside off, cut away to the sweeper cover
short, wide and called.
full on middle, blocked off the full face of the bat.
full and wide again, chopped down to third man.
flat outside off, like Raina usually bowls. Beaten
spin for Raina. That should be an indicator of the pitch. Pitches it outside off, spins back in. Strikes the batsman on the thigh pad
drilled past cover for  couple.
tossed up on middle, pushed back to the bowler
flat on middle and leg, worked away to deep midwicket
flat outside off, punched to cover off the back foot
lots of flight outside off, slogged/swiped/heaved away to deep midwicket. On the bounce to the fielder
flighted outside off, blocked away towards point
carrom ball on middle and leg, clipped to long-on. Not a bad effort from Perera this.
a massive swipe. Very slow flight outside off, heaved to square leg with terrible timing
very slow again, pitches outside leg to spin in and hit Perera on the pad. No run
lovely. Flat on off, spins away from Perera to take the outside edge, towards point.
fullish delivery outside off, pushed away to deep cover
full on middle, in the slot for Perera and he goes after it but gets a thick inside edge which travels to short fine leg
slower ball on off, punched away to a wide cover
another slower ball outside off, beaten
another slower ball ,played away towards the bowler for a quick single. Good batting by Perera. The ball wasn't there and he respected it with a run
what timing on that. Full outside off, overpitched. Drilled away to cover
tossed up on leg, Perera comes down the ground to drill to long-on

flat outside off, Dhoni goes up in appeal, Raina doesn't even appeal. The umpire gives him. Senanayake is stunned, he can't believe he has been given. Another poor decision. Full delivery outside off, skids on with the arm, Senanayake misses his drive - not by much, but no connection. Dhoni takes it but another bad decision. Raina indicates he didn't hear anything.
tossed up on middle, worked to midwicket

taken. Jadeja holds onto a classy catch. Tossed up on off, Perera comes down and looks to go down the ground but the spin helps take the outside half, skewed away towards cover. Jadeja runs in from sweeper cover to hold on. Is that the match?
clipped to square leg
flat down leg, off the pad. Too much spin for lbw.
flat on off, blocked
flat outside off, spins to bet the exuberant against-the-spin flick
smashed for four. Got down early and pummeled the sweep to the backward square leg fence. Great connection.
shortish and wide, pushed to cover
darted in on middle, blocked again
length on middle, thick inside edge rolls to square leg for a run
yorker outside off, goes under the bat of Dilhara.
yorker attempted on off, ends up as a low full toss. Pushed back to the bowler
slower delivery, totally deceives Dilhara who somehow gets bat on it, towards midwicket
another slower delivery on off, Chameera gives himself room and skews it over point for a run
bowled. That is it. The yorker is too quick for Dilhara and SL finish with 82. Very full on off, Dilhara gets his bat down but the ball has already hit the stump. SL's lowest T20 score.
